sig_info: Marine Corps. The Vietnam War. The Italian Mafia. Frank Castle has conditioned himself for high pain tolerance, granting him a 30 to 85% chance to trigger an Indestructible Passive that lasts 8 seconds when receiving a lethal blow. This can only trigger once per fight.

ALL ATTACKS: 11% chance to gain a Fury Buff for 7 seconds, granting +41.5 Attack.
Attacking an opponent that is Bleeding has a 20% chance to trigger an additional Bleed, dealing 45.65 Direct Damage over 2.50 seconds.
PASSIVE: The flak jacket made by Microchip grants the Punisher 4 stacks of Resist Physical at the start of the fight, each increasing Physical Resistance by 177.78. Each stack is lost when Punisher is struck 8 times.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 70% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 95.45 Direct Damage over 6 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 85% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 128.65 Direct Damage over 5.50 seconds.
When the Bleed from this attack expires, it has a 65% chance to be converted into an Open Wound. An Open Wound counts as a stack of Bleed but is Passive and deals no damage.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 178.45 Direct Damage over 5 seconds.
Attack increases by up to 99.6 based on lost Health.
When the Bleed from this attack expires, it has a 90% chance to be converted into an Open Wound. An Open Wound counts as a stack of Bleed but is Passive and deals no damage.
